revisions.rev:
{{TOC right}} '''Highway 16A''' is the name of two [[alternate route]]s off of [[Alberta Highway 16|Alberta Highway 16]], (the [[Yellowhead highway]]). The [[Evansburg, Alberta|Evansburg]] section is called 16A:08 by Alberta Transportation, while 16A:24 runs through [[Vegreville, Alberta|Vegreville]]. The section west of [[Edmonton]] is labelled 16A:14 and 16A:16 on Alberta Transportation maps, but is better known as [[Parkland Highway]] and [[Stony Plain Road]]. == Evansburg == {{Infobox road |province=AB |type=Hwy |route=16A |highway_name= |name_notes= |alternate_name= |maint=[[Alberta Transportation]] |map_custom= |map= |length_km=13.6 |length_round=1 |length_ref= |length_notes= |established= |decommissioned= |direction_a=West |terminus_a={{Jct|state=AB|Hwy|16}} west of [[Evansburg, Alberta|Evansburg]] |junction={{Jct|state=AB|Hwy|22}} |direction_b=East |terminus_b={{Jct|state=AB|Hwy|16|Hwy|22}} in [[Entwistle, Alberta|Entwistle]] |rural_municipalities=[[Yellowhead County, Alberta|Yellowhead County]], [[Parkland County, Alberta|Parkland County]] |previous_type=Hwy |previous_route=16 |next_type=Hwy |next_route=16A |next_dab=Stony Plain Road }} Highway 16A:08 parallels Highway 16 to the north, intersecting Highway 22, and passing through [[Evansburg, Alberta|Evansburg]] and the [[Pembina River Provincial Park]]. === Major intersections === Starting from the north end of Highway 16A:{{cite web | url=http://www.transportation.alberta.ca/Content/docType329/Production/provincial001-216.pdf | title=2010 Provincial Highways 1 - 216 Series Progress Chart (map, 8 MB) | publisher=Alberta Transportation | year=2010 | accessdate=2011-01-25}} {| class="wikitable" !Municipality ![[Exit number|km]] !Intersecting road !Notes ![[Geographical coordinates|Coordinates]] |- |rowspan=3|[[Yellowhead County, Alberta|Yellowhead County]] |0.0 |{{Jct|state=AB|Hwy|16}} |West to [[Wildwood, Alberta|Wildwood]] |{{Coord|53|36|10|N|115|8|44|W|name=16A:08 km 00|format=dec}} |- |2.7 |{{Jct|state=AB|Hwy|22}}, Range Road 83 |North to [[Mayerthorpe, Alberta|Mayerthorpe]] |{{Coord|53|36|16|N|115|6|26|W|name=16A:08 km 02|format=dec}} |- |8.5 |Range Road 75 |[[Evansburg, Alberta|Evansburg]] |{{Coord|53|36|7|N|115|1|20|W|name=16A:08 km 08|format=dec}} |- |align=center|â / â |10.8 |colspan=2|[[Pembina River (Alberta)|Pembina River]] |{{Coord|53|35|59|N|115|0|15|W|name=16A:08 km 10|format=dec}} |- |rowspan=3|[[Parkland County, Alberta|Parkland County]] |11.3 |''Road'' |[[Pembina River Provincial Park]] |{{Coord|53|36|14|N|115|0|12|W|name=16A:08 km 11|format=dec}} |- |13.0 |50 Avenue, Main Street |[[Entwistle, Alberta|Entwistle]] |{{Coord|53|35|38|N|114|59|34|W|name=16A:08 km 13|format=dec}} |- |13.6 |{{Jct|state=AB|Hwy|16}}(Exit 289)
{{Jct|state=AB|Hwy|22}} |Grade separated
East to [[Gainford, Alberta|Gainford]]
South to [[Drayton Valley, Alberta|Drayton Valley]] |{{Coord|53|35|22|N|114|59|19|W|name=16A:08 km 14|format=dec}} {{legendRJL}} == Parkland Highway == {{Infobox road |province=AB |type=Hwy |route=16A |highway_name= |name_notes= |alternate_name= |maint=[[Alberta Transportation]] |map_custom= |map= |length_km=35 |length_round= |length_ref= |length_notes= |established= |decommissioned= |direction_a=West |terminus_a={{Jct|state=AB|Hwy|16}} west of [[Stony Plain, Alberta|Stony Plain]] |junction={{Jct|state=AB|Hwy|60}} |direction_b=East |terminus_b={{Jct|state=AB|Hwy|216}} in [[Edmonton, Alberta|Edmonton]] |rural_municipalities=[[Parkland County, Alberta|Parkland County]] |previous_type=Hwy |previous_route=16A|previous_dab=Evansburg |next_type=Hwy |next_route=16A |next_dab=Vegreville }} {{Main|Stony Plain Road}} Running for {{convert|35|km|mi|abbr=on}} Parkland Highway runs parallel to Highway 16 to the south, through [[Stony Plain, Alberta|Stony Plain]], [[Spruce Grove, Alberta|Spruce Grove]], and [[Acheson, Alberta|Acheson]] into [[Edmonton]]. This road is known as Stony Plain Road in Edmonton, and continues into [[downtown Edmonton]]. Highway 16A ends at Edmonton's ring road [[Alberta Highway 216|Anthony Henday Drive (Highway 216)]]. This Highway, labelled Highway 16 until 1997, is a more leisurely alternative route to the corresponding section of Highway 16. == Vegreville == {{Infobox road |province=AB |type=Hwy |route=16A |highway_name= |name_notes= |alternate_name=50 Avenue |maint=[[Alberta Transportation]] |map_custom= |map= |length_km=11.2 |length_round=1 |length_ref= |length_notes= |established= |decommissioned= |direction_a=West |terminus_a={{Jct|state=AB|Hwy|16}} |direction_b=East |terminus_b={{Jct|state=AB|Hwy|16}} |rural_municipalities=[[Minburn County No. 27, Alberta|Minburn No. 27 County]] |towns=[[Vegreville, Alberta|Vegreville]] |previous_type=Hwy |previous_route=16A |previous_dab=Stony Plain Road |next_type=Hwy |next_route=17 }} Highway 16A:24 runs through the Town of [[Vegreville, Alberta|Vegreville]] as 50 Avenue. === Major intersections === Starting from the west end of Highway 16A: {| class="wikitable" !Municipality ![[Exit number|km]] !Intersecting road !Notes ![[Geographical coordinates|Coordinates]] |- |rowspan=4|[[Minburn County No. 27, Alberta|County of Minburn No. 27]] |0.0 |{{Jct|state=AB|Hwy|16}}(Exit 481) |West to [[Mundare, Alberta|Mundare]] |{{Coord|53|31|26|N|112|8|16|W|name=16A:24 km 00|format=dec}} |- |bgcolor=DDFFDD|6.1 |bgcolor=DDFFDD|[[Alberta Highway 857|Hwy 857]], 60 Street, Range Road 150 |bgcolor=DDFFDD|North to [[Willingdon, Alberta|Willingdon]]
Begin 857 south concurrency |{{Coord|53|30|0|N|112|3|58|W|name=16A:24 km 06|format=dec}} |- |bgcolor=DDFFDD|8.1 |bgcolor=DDFFDD|[[Alberta Highway 857|Hwy 857]], 47 Street, Range Road 145 |bgcolor=DDFFDD|[[Vegreville, Alberta|Vegreville]]
South to [[Bruce, Alberta|Bruce]]
End 857 south concurrency |{{Coord|53|29|25|N|112|2|31|W|name=16A:24 km 08|format=dec}} |- |11.2 |{{Jct|state=AB|Hwy|16}} (Exit 492) |East to [[Lavoy, Alberta|Lavoy]] |{{Coord|53|28|45|N|112|0|37|W|name=16A:24 km 11|format=dec}} {{legendRJL}} {{kml}} == References == {{Reflist|2}} == External links == *[http://www.transportation.alberta.ca/Content/docType329/Production/provincial001-216.pdf 2010 Provincial Highways 1 - 216 Series Progress Chart (map, 8 MB)] by Alberta Transportation. {{Alberta Provincial Highways|Hwy=yes}} [[Category:Alberta Primary Highways, 1-216 series|016A]]
